description: This file defines the CourtProvider class, a state management component for fetching and storing court data, used in a Flutter application for court browsing and booking. It interacts with an API client and exposes properties and methods for managing court list data, including loading and error states.

classes.name: CourtProvider
classes.description: A ChangeNotifier that manages the list of courts and related state for the frontend, supporting load and refresh operations.

methods.name: loadCourts
methods.description: Fetches the list of courts asynchronously from an API, updates the internal state, and notifies listeners.

methods.name: refresh
methods.description: A shortcut to reload the courts list, calling loadCourts.
